<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get all AWS Logging Accounts</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/cloudAccounts/awsLoggingAccounts"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get the list of all the AWS Logging accounts and its details.

## Request
